attributes.action: Ensure that "Life Sentences" last for the duration of the "Life" of the convicted Person,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Life sentences should be what they say and imply to the British Public. Where "Life" sentences are given, there should be no parole or shortening of these penalties. The most serious of crimes require the most severe of sanctions in an attempt to begin to make restitution for the wrong committed.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Home Offie.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
